item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 29 EurekaCast NOW! First Annual Citizen Science Conference
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, and also Technology. It's finally arrived. Listen in as Kai and Rowan, along with Dr. Anton Imogen: Life Energy Expert from the American Society of Energists an Mr. Poindexter Dweebson: Chronoconsultant and Chronofinancer, peer review, live on air, the best Citizen Science has to offer. Broadcasted: Sat, March 13, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Mon, March 15, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.title: 28 EurekaCast NOW! Questions for Extraterrestrials
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, and also Technology. We are closer than ever to discovering life outside of our own planet. It could happen to anyone at any time. So we all must be prepared with the right questions to ask them! Broadcasted: Sat, March 5, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Mon, March 8, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 27 EurekaCast NOW! Optimize Your Lounging
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, and also Technology. Not all lounging is created equal! Even if you're not sleep deprived, chances are, you are lounge deprived! Learn how much lounging you actually need to be productive, and what you can do to make sure you're getting the best lounge you can get! Broadcasted: Sat, Feb 27, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Mon, March 1, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 26 EurekaCast NOW! Making Data Sexy
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, and also Technology. Who doesn't love data? Who doesn't have fond memories of frolicking through amber fields of data as a child? We all do. But let's be honest, data has lost its luster. Hear how Dr. Micahel Hackensack, New Jersey and the folks at Sale Loft are working to sexify data once more. Broadcasted: Sat, Feb 20, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Mon, Feb 22, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.title: 25 EurekaCast NOW! Relationship Science
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, and also Technology. There's no book on 'love,' but did you know that science can actually provide us important markers to keep in mind as you navigate your social and romantic relationships. Learn about them here! Broadcasted: Sat, Feb 13, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Mon, Feb 15, 2021, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL

item.title: 23 EurekaCast NOW! The Bot-volution
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, and also Technology. Kai and Rowan discuss the social media bot-volution, updates in the New Sun Theory, and the spiderweb geometry of the universe. The second half features a re-release of last week's Etoli Carouso interview about Watchtoo. item.title: The Making of the Newer Normal Holiday Special
item.description:
Special Holiday Stream! The Making of the Newer Normal Holiday Special The Safer Santa user immersive digital storytelling experience is finally here, and already downloaded on all your guy5 enabled devices. While you are at home experiencing the best holiday AI has to offer, make some time to tune in to hear how two young, innovative tech entrepreneurs are disrupting the holiday special landscape as we know it, and their journey to this monumental achievement. Broadcasted: Dec 24, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Dec 26, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL and on Dec 28, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering
item.content:encoded:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology.
Special Holiday Stream!
The Making of the Newer Normal Holiday Special
The Safer Santa user immersive digital storytelling experience is finally here, and already downloaded on all your guy5 enabled devices. While you are at home experiencing the best holiday AI has to offer, make some time to tune in to hear how two young, innovative tech entrepreneurs are disrupting the holiday special landscape as we know it, and their journey to this monumental achievement.
Broadcasted: Dec 24, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL

item.title: 19 EurekaCast NOW! The Making of a Solar Punk Military
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: Military and the environment are two of the fastest growing and most innovative fields of technological development today. Learn about how the DoD is bridging the gap between them, and creating a more eco-conscious, sustainable, solar punk military. item.title: 18 EurekaCast NOW! Making the Most of Your Holiday Isolation
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: We're not out of it yet! The holiday season is upon us, bringing with it an increased risk of MALO-21. The Chicago Health and Safety Commission is advising everyone to bunker down and isolate once more. Learn what resources are available for you to make the most out of your isolation! Originally Aired: Nov 28, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL Rebroadcasted: Nov 30, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WIIT 88.9 FM Chicago, IL

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 16 EurekaCast NOW! City Chute
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: It's done. It has been for quite a while. But they're finally starting to think about letting people in! And ECN! has been given an exclusive early glimpse into the Erection Group's new disruptive transportation technology: City Chute. Listen for an in-depth recounting of a seven minute, intensive trip into this, which promises to cut commute times in Vancouver, Washington, and a city near you, in half! Originally Aired: Nov 14, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.title: 13 EurekaCast NOW! Success Stories
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: Sure, we've all heard about the negative impacts that the MALO-21 pandemic has had on small businesses. Now, let's talk about the success stories: the companies that saw this time - this Newer Normal - as an opportunity to invest and innovate. And guess what...it paid off BIGTIME. Originally Aired: Oct 24, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 12 EurekaCast NOW! Fiberglass: A Textile for Living
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: LISTENER BE ADVISED! There are dangerous and counter-to-even-basic-common-sense views expressed in this special feature. I will say this once: fiberglass has NOT been tested as a "safe", and "comfortable" material for masks, no matter what you hear from "alternative scientists."
Originally Aired: Oct 17, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
